docs.snippet: The Dallas Cowboys released Kyle Orton, Tony Romo’s backup at quarterback, a move that was expected after he skipped off-season workouts....

docs.snippet: UEFA's Emergency Panel has decided Russian and Ukrainian clubs cannot be drawn against each other in a UEFA competition in the upcoming season, European football's governing body announced on Thursday....
